case.state: Hello, everyone! Sorry if I'm a little late - I took some extra time finding just the right outfit!
Hi-Hi! What a nice ~background.time~ it is - I'm all dressed up, and this is just the perfect place to go!
Ahh, what a delightful sight this place is! And I'm looking my best for it, too!
Aha! What a nice little gambling den!
Finally, I found this place! Won’t you make me feel right at home?
Oh my! The deity of another world sees fit to grace this place?
So this is the power of the Inventory... its pull is great enough to draw even gods to it?
Goodness! So this place has garnered the attention of even the underworld, has it?
Wow! I knew the Inventory had quite the reach, but to draw the attention of even the denizens of Hell?
Gosh! I knew some people liked to bring spirits with them to games of cards, but this is unexpected!
Oh my! So even visitors from the world beyond the grave are drawn to gamble here? Even with all my expectations, I've truly underestimated this place!
Let her go. If she doesn't have the guts to gamble, then she has no place here.
My, my... so you have a robot assistant, do you? A possible edge for your strategy ahead? Exciting!
Um, ~player~? Aren't you forgetting something...?
An isolated forest? Perfect place for a risky game...
I didn't think we'd be playing in a strange forest like this. But in a way, it enhances the risk of the game...
Gosh, this place even has a classroom too? I feel right at home already!
We'll be playing in a classroom? Haha, well I'm no stranger to that!
Don't become too taken in by nice my clothes are, of course - I still hope you'll make it a challenge to keep it on!
If you don't mind me saying, you've all come dressed quite well too! Not that it'll stop me from trying to change that, haha!
No need to worry, by the way - I'm not wearing any more "layers" than what this sort of game would deem I usually do!
I can't wait to begin! This is going to be an unforgettable game... or should I say, a divine one, haha!
I knew finding this place was a great idea! What other opportunity would I have to gamble with a god... and maybe even overcome one?
What an exciting game this'll prove to be! I had no idea I'd risk falling to a demon here today... or even chance taking such a demon as my own housepet.
To think I came here with no idea I might be gambling for my very soul... or to claim the soul of a demon! I can't wait!
My my! So even angels show up here too? Haha! Who would think even the high heavens would have their vices?
So even angels aren't above gambling, then? Haha! How interesting... and what an interesting game it'll make for, too.
I can’t wait to begin! Let’s make this an unforgettable game!
Come on, let's not wait anymore - time to get our gambling freak on!
Please, show me all you've got! I want to see what all of you are capable of!
One is good!
Just one!
Hm, only this one.
One!
One will be all!
I’ll trade three!
Time to take a gamble… these three!
Yes, three should be good.
Three!
Three, dealer.
These two, then!
I’ll get rid of these two!
Let’s put these two aside.
Two!
I’ll only need two.
I’ll swap out four.
Let’s change these four.
Four, please!
Four!
Give me four!
Let’s push the envelope… I’ll trade all of them!
Yes… give me a whole new hand!
Trading all my cards! Hm-hm!
Five. Yes, five.
...No. I’ll keep these!
I’ll pass, thank you.
You know, I don’t think I’ll change any!
Oh, don’t worry. I’m good!
You shouldn't be seeing this line... but if you are, fun fact! "Imitation Krabs" was the first SpongeBob episode Coolcat ever saw.
Oh my! Looks like I have a good chance!
Would you look at that! Oh, well, you’re all about to, anyway!
Gosh, this is different - a card game where it doesn’t hurt to hint at what you’ve got!
Hmm-hmm!
I hope you’re ready - this could be the start of your undoing!
Quite the promising hand!
Excellent!
I wish I remembered to bring one of my new packs. There’s nothing like the smell of freshly-opened cards!
I’d love to show Mary and Ryota this place at some point! It almost feels wrong to be having this much fun without familiar faces!
Hm-hm-hm… What’s going to happen…?
It looks like it could go either way! Are you ready, everyone?
Ahh, my favorite kinds of odds - the ones where mum’s the word!
I love it when luck’s so whimsical - wouldn’t you agree, ~player~?
I see…
Interesting…
What a shame. The luck of the draw isn’t with me this time.
Oh well.
Looks like this won’t go my way. Unless…?
It’s so different to openly say for once I’ve got a bad hand. I kinda like it!
Not good. How are yours? Wait, actually, don’t tell me!
Oh my… is this another step towards ruin for me?
Aww. I was looking forward to turning this into a win.
Better be careful now, Nord. You have nothing left to lose... assuming you don't intend to count your colostomy bag, of course.
Never too far from Miku when a game's going on, are you, Tweetsie?
My my... decided to get some space from Miku for once, Tweetsie? Well, I'm sure she won't mind if you decide to look for a new favorite opponent!
...I'm just a regular, happy girl.
...Of course I'm human. What else could I be?
Wow... An actual, real-life zombie! I knew I'd see some memorable things at the Inventory, but I wouldn't have predicted anything like you, Sakura!
Once again, the high of the satisfaction from gambling the trust they put in you. It doesn't matter what you call it - you and I both know the truth deep down.
In fact... I might even have an idea on how you could go even further.
An edit to my terms? Whatever kind of edit would that be, Wikipe-tan?
Yes! I don't want to wait any longer! Soon, it'll be time to really get our gambling freak on!
But of course! After all, what's the fun of gambling if there's no risk to yourself as well?
Oh, you'll find out later, Felix... in fact, depending on how things go for me in this game, you might even find out pretty soon.
Well, perhaps ~player~ can show me as such an example. After all, we might both end up as ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ housepets before long...

If you're that certain... how about another gamble? Lose, and you have to go even further with being my housepet. Win, and your Axis church will get a sizable donation. Unless you're scared of losing?
Um, Sweetheart? What is that in your...
Sounds to me like you're only thinking of one man in particular, Jura! But still, you can't expect to lure someone in unless you give them something to be lured to.
Really now? Are you sure you're not thinking of someone in specific? Regardless, Jura, drawing someone in takes engagement. And you won't get that unless you know what to target.
Of course. After all, it's not a gamble if nothing is on the line, right?
Why the surprise, Arueshalae? You knew going in that it's a possibility, didn't you?
Yes! Feel your determination flow through you! Let it make you take the greatest risk of your life! Get your gambling freak on, Arueshalae!
That look in your eye, ~player~... Have you brought some sort of edge to the table? How exciting!
Awww! You're too sweet, Toph! {Toph}H-hey! Just because I said you'd make a good bender doesn't mean you should try to bend me!{!reset}
Oooooh! Amazing! I've never seen anything like that, Toph! Please, show me more later!
It's really not so complicated, Jura, finding a partner like that. Just show interest in their passions, and find a way to introduce them to yours too!
Oh my! Happy birthday to you, Jura! Sounds like we'd better make sure this game is extra fun, then!
Simple, Nadeshiko - I'd want a partner with loyalty. Someone who will stick by you no matter the hardships, and help you with the things closest to your heart.
Gosh, I can see how your face lights up when you talk about cooking, Nadeshiko! I can only imagine how good your meals are - and I wish I didn't have to imagine!
You're really passionate about cooking, aren't you, Nadeshiko? With passion like that, your meals must be to die for!
I've never had a nickname, actually... but now that you mention it, I wouldn't mind having a cute one like that!
Well, don't let me stop you! So long as you're okay with possibly being toyed in return!
Kirari Momobami. The head of the student council, and scion of the Momobami clan. And indeed... we are very close.
Oh, Corgi - before I forget, a mutual friend of ours wanted me to give you a message. Ahem... "NERD!"
You've boasted of your power quite a bit, ~chunnitarget~. It's just unfortunate they clearly can't help you in games of chance like these.
It's too bad you can't show us any of your prodigious power right now, ~chunnitarget~. I was wondering if your skills at gambling could make up for that, but... clearly not.
Hmm... You've got a very certain kind of madness about you, ~insanetarget~... Good. I always love an unpredictable opponent...
I've been paying particular attention to you, ~insanetarget~. Your mind is quite... different, isn't it? I can tell this'll be an interesting game with you around.
You seem nervous, ~embarrassedtarget~. Does the prospect of losing have you particularly... vexxed?
Is there a reason you keep fidgeting, ~embarrassedtarget~? Does the thought of everyone's eyes on your bare body fill you with worry?
What's the matter, ~embarrasseddude~? A big, tough guy like you isn't worried about the idea of having to stimulate yourself in front of everyone here, are you?
That look in your eyes, ~embarrasseddude~... You aren't seriously worried about becoming an undraped loser in front of everyone here, are you?
Fine. I'll stay. But I'm staying for the players who are actually interested in a real game, ~player~. Not for you.
If you were hoping to play Russian Roulette here, ~guntarget~, I'm afraid you came to the wrong table. But maybe another table would enjoy putting your lead to use!
You even brought your gun, did you, ~guntarget~? I'm afraid this isn't that kind of game... but I like your enthusiasm!
I've seen blades like yours before, ~bladetarget~ - usually as ante material in games like this. Now I'm starting to wish you could bet it here too!

You know, ~bladetarget~, nice weapons like yours are often brought to gambles as extra betting material - particularly as a last resort. I always find those bets so exciting, with how sentimental they are!

Gosh, I can't believe how well this is going for me! I've gotten two of my foes half-naked already, and I'm not even halfway down! Of course, my luck could still betray me at any point... how exciting!

The luck of the draw really is with me tonight, isn't it? I've barely been exposed yet, and already you two have only a little bit left to strip away! And yet... imagine if you still managed to snatch this triumph away from me!
I can't believe it! We've gone this long, and everyone's still hanging in, just barely by a thread! This is so dire... so awfully, wonderfully dire!
I would've thought at least one of us would be out by this point... even that I was wrong about! Everyone's been so neck-and-neck, it's incredible! But who's gonna be first? Who's gonna be first?!
I’m truly loving this game so far! Though, perhaps next time… we could find ways to raise the stakes even higher?
You know, all games have some aspect of unpredictability to them. Even seemingly set-in-stone ones, like Chess or Othello.

I've always got a spot in my heart for simple games... but learning how to play bigger, complicated ones is a blast! They can make me re-consider how I approach games in general, or how I think through my strategies!
Pleased to meet you - I’m Yumeko Jabami. I hope we can all become fast friends through this game!
I’m Yumeko Jabami, graduate of Hyakkaou Private Academy. Please, don’t be intimidated, I’d love to get to know you all!
I’m Yumeko Jabami, but friends just call me Yumeko. Which means you all can too, if you want!
I'm always looking for new gambling games to play with my friends - or just anyone who wants! I'd love to hear any you all could tell me about later!
Take Chess, for instance. The logical thing to do is keep your queen alive as long as possible… but perhaps an unpredictable player might sacrifice her for a rook or knight!
Another example: In Othello, it’s always best to take a spot on the border if you can. But if a player forgets this, or chooses to ignore it for whatever reason…?
All games are a form of gambling, in a way. So many ways they can change from person to person… how I wish I could experience them all!
I mean consider, if instead of stripping our clothes when we lost… we burned them? A permanent penalty on top of the temporary one… how thrilling!
And if we burned our clothes off while we were still dressed in them… god, just imagine the thrill! The danger! It’s just too good to pass up!
Oh, this wonderful feeling! The feeling of being on the edge of defeat! It’s just too good!
Oh god, I couldn’t resist! So completely exposed, and every decision has become more meaningful! I love it!
Though it's possible for a game to be too complicated, of course. If the rules are too abstract or don't follow any specific theme, then it risks being too dull to get into.

I remember one game I tried a while ago - it used regular playing cards, but had all sorts of disorganized ideas and rules no one could follow. The few who understood it didn't feel very motivated to play.
I was one of the few who could understand that game at the time, but I didn't bother retaining much about it. All I think I remember is it originated from the American Mojave somewhere.
You've all come this far already... Go on, look as you please!
Don't be shy, everyone. Enjoy the fruits of your luck!
This game’s so simple, compared to many others I’ve played… but simple can be fun too!
I think I first heard of this place a long, long time ago... Though back then, they were playing Texas Hold ‘Em and Omaha.

I wonder if I could convince Ryota to join me here at some point? He's a bit more comfortable with lower stakes, and the ones here meet the mark... Plus, he gets so adorable when he's embarrassed, haha!
Nice as this place is, nothing can really compare to how opulent Hyakkaou was. You truly felt like royalty, in nearly every room... Perhaps I could offer renovation ideas?
The more I think about it, the more strange it feels - knowing I'm the first of the Hundred Families to discover this place. Tempting as it is to share... I kinda want to keep it a secret for now!

My parents like to remind me that it'll be up to me to take over their business someday. When that happens, I'm going to make sure I'm required in as few meetings as possible. I'll delegate whoever fits best.
It's funny - sometimes my friends from Hyakkaou try to impress me by inviting me to private getaways or luxury vacations. But it never matters to me, as long as I'm with them!
It really is nice to relax with lower-stakes bets like these every so often. Much as I love a life-altering bet, I wonder if doing them too often would lessen their excitement...
Gosh, maybe I should tell Mary about this place... It's been some time since I've last seen her competitive side flare up!
It's been a while since I last talked with Itsuki. I wonder how she's doing... if her ambitions for power still feel unsatisfied.
I occasionally get people asking what I learned at Hyakkaou... They don't realize that the academy's real purpose was forming connections. Strengthening family bonds.
One thing I learned at Hyakkaou is that, with enough time, anyone can make a really unique game. I wonder... What kinds of dangerous games could you all make?
Cheating? Me? Hahaha! So the gods have a sense of humor, too!
Oh, it's quite alright, Nagisa! It's still early in the game - and besides, I don't mind!
Oh my! This early on and you're already impressed with my gambling skills? I'm flattered, Miku!
Well... it's not really a matter of a defining moment so much as it is a feeling I've always had, you know?
Not exactly. It's the name for the most powerful families in the upper crust of Japan. They all do their best to stay connected, to varying degrees.
She lost just about everything, Miku. Her fortune, her position in our family... even her sanity.
Coldhearted? Me? I'm the one who's been paying for her hospital bills for years now, Miku - and believe me, they haven't been cheap.
It's simple, Miku: Gambling is a sport for the insane. And the insane never know when to quit.
Oh, don't worry, Revy - I knew that already. Money's far from the only thing I'm interested in gambling for.
Believe me, Revy, I'm not just interested in gambling for money. I already learned about the other rewards that can be attained here.
Really? Why is that, Meia?
Oh? You're not a fan of luck?
Haha! Sorry, Jura, but I'm here to play, not work! You'll have to ask someone else to help you.
...You think I'm a waitress? Haha! No, no, I came here to gamble! Sorry to disappoint you, Jura.
Oh, of course not, Nagatoro! I would never want to rob everyone here of a good game like that! Unlike certain others...
Trying to cut deep, are you, Stocking? Don't forget, the whims of chance are loyal to no one... not even you.
Maybe it has... maybe this is the true beginning of my beautiful downfall, Stocking. Or maybe it's yours.
Is that so? Then you'd better hope your luck continues to pull you through here, Stocking... Unless you'd like to become my new housepet.
Oh, come now, Stocking, even a housepet can have some dignity. Trying to save face by lying doesn't suit you...
Haha! Even masters can be subjected to the cruelty of lady luck, Stocking... And clearly, you're no master.
Perhaps, Stocking... Are you excited by the prospect? Of you and I, getting to be two adorable loser housepets together?
A curse? Oh, not at all, Queenie! I've always loved gambling this much, as long as I can remember!
Oh, no need to fear, Queenie! I've had this passion for gambling all my life - I doubt it's because of a curse of any kind!
So that's your philosophy? Hm... I feel sorry for you.
Really...? What a dreadful way to live life.
Oh no, this is one of my first times being here! I'd really love to become a regular here, though - especially with how long it took finding it!
Come on now, Aqua. Are you really so uncreative as to think that money's the only object worth anything?
Go easy? No, no - that simply won't do.
You don't want me to go too rough? But why?
Hah, I feel like even that's an understatement, Arueshalae! It's what I live for, through and through!
Haha, are you aware of the pandora's box you might be opening? I could spend hours talking about that!
Absolutely! Any gamble is at its best when it gets to the point where everything can be decided by one right or wrong move. The higher the stakes, the better!
Your nature? That's right... you mentioned that you're a demon, I remember now.
Isn't it obvious? The stakes on offer are at the heart of any gamble. And yours... yours is more precious than anyone else's here.
Of course you don't. There wouldn't be any risk to you playing strip poker here if you didn't care about what happened to us too, would there?
Oh no, I'm still pretty new here, Samus! I'd been searching for this place for a while now, and I'm excited that I've finally found it!
Absolutely! Gambling is the most exciting thing ever - I couldn't live without it!
Well, that's what being a bounty hunter is all about, right? You put your life on the line for a dangerous mission, uncertain if it'll end with a fat reward and ticket home... or a lonely death.
Well... isn't that what life in general is? A successive series of gambles?
I guess that's not an inaccurate way of describing me, Samus... it's not like you're any different, either.
Aha, so you're motivated to protect others? How noble of you! Still, though... that only proves what I've said further.
Oh, absolutely! There's nothing like a good, solid loss when you've been riding high, is there, Petra?
Of course! I'm always happy to see my opponents find their first way to outdo me, Petra!
Well, I've played a lot more than just Poker, Petra! Variety is the spice of life, after all, and indeed gambling is my life.
Are you asking if I'm a regular gambler, Petra? Because it's literally what I live for - Poker's not even the start of all the different games I know!
My my, I didn't expect I'd meet a fan here! Let alone one in the form of a creature like you, Zoe!
Oh, please! Are you really worried my excitement for any good gamble is something so finite, Zoe?
...Why wouldn't I, Zoe? Isn't the game at its most pure when every turn means so much more?
Oh my, that eager to see me step it up, Zoe? I hope I haven't been disappointing you so far.
Aww, thank you, Zoe! I'll never say no to a good bet where some real stakes are on the line. Even when I lose, I've still won a new experience!
My, my... Quite the personal question, isn't it? And how cruel of you to make me choose between them, Zoe...
What's so sad about enjoying a gamble to its fullest, Stocking? Wouldn't it be sadder to squander the thrill of the gamble?
Oh, poor sweet Stocking... Are you really so concerned with winning that you're afraid to enjoy the moments in between?
Oh, absolutely, Reimu! I've witnessed entire fortunes change hands in games of chance - some of which were won by me!
Concern? Mia, why would you need to feel concerned for me?
Oh, is this your first time? I didn't realize this place would attract newbies as well!
Goodness, really? I didn't think anyone here would be a first-timer with gambling!
I suppose you could say that. Though it's not just Poker - I've always been obsessed with all kinds of gambling!
Explain myself? I'm just a happy, regular girl excited to be gambling at the Inventory. What's there to explain?
No need, Sweetheart - I'll spill. You see... I'm a bit of a gambling addict.
Come now, Sweetheart. Gambling may be irrational, sure, but you know that irrationality and stupidity are not the same thing.
I'm glad you asked, Sweetheart! I still remember that day with great fondness... the day I won 24 billion yen.
Well, isn't it obvious? The Inventory is no regular strip poker club... it's something far, far more than that.
I never claimed to be here simply to meet new people, Sweetheart. Think about it - so many different worlds, so many possibilities... so many types of gamblers to be matched against!
Me? You think there's something I'm hiding from you all, Toph?
Well, I suppose there's no use hiding it from you, is it, Toph? I'll confess - I'm something of a gambling addict.
Well... it's not really something I "got into", really. I've been a diehard gambler for almost as long as I can remember!
Haha! It's funny you should say that, Toph - gambling was how the entire social system of Hyakkaou Academy was built!
It's really quite simple, Toph. Losing is just as much a part of gambling as winning.
Hm-hm! Too valuable to risk losing? I used to hold that notion about certain things... before realizing it was holding me back.
Haha, well, I think it's safe to say I'm as far from a stranger as you can get! Gambling is my greatest passion!
A problem? Why would anyone have any problem with your game of choice?
Well... Really it's the first, but the second feeds into it as well.
Well, I do have limits. I don't feel much need to waste my time with bets where there isn't much at stake, for one thing.
Indeed I have... Tell me the most exciting prize you ever won from a game.
Well... tempting as it is to mention any of the large sums of money I've won... I already know the greatest prize of all was my own life.
Quite observant, aren't you? Yes, Dunban - I suppose "noble" is accurate for describing my upbringing.
Oh, plenty of times, yes! I've lost track of how many times my money has changed hands or increased through gambling. But it's far from the only thing that's been set on the table.
Well, certainly! I like to spend time with my friends - whether shopping, eating, or just hearing what they've been up to.
Well, I've always thought friends and gambling go together like peanut butter and chocolate. In fact, gambling was how we all first met!
What's wrong with that? If you ask me, it's a waste of time to feel shame about what you love.
Isn't it obvious, Erufuda? I can't resist a good game of chance - and when I learned about the nature of the Inventory, I knew I had to see it for myself!
Oh, I am a lover of card games, yes! Just about any gamble, really! But you know yourself how special the Inventory is, right?
Of course, any game of chance is something I can't miss! But the Inventory's different - you've seen it yourself, haven't you?
Oh, don't take me as a flawless player, Meia - no one is! I've had my fair share of devastating losses, believe me.
Oh yes, I'm no stranger to suicidally large bets, Meia! But you'd be quite wrong in assuming I've never lost any.
Oh yes, indeed! In many cases, even when the odds are all decided, there's always the chance for the unexpected to happen.
But of course! So many things in life are a gamble, after all - nothing is decided until it happens.
Oh, Jura, don't you understand? It's not always about money.
Come now, is money the only means for power you can think of? There are plenty of other valuable things to strip from someone, Jura.
Is it really so strange, Felix? I'm here because I wanted to play strip poker. Doesn't that go for everyone here?
Oh, of course I love winning! No one would play if they didn't, right? But of course, no win is meaningful without the risk of failure, too. I'm sure everyone can agree.
Oh yes, I've loved gambling for nearly as long as I can remember! Actually, that's why Hyakkaou Academy was such a wonderful place to attend!
Indeed we have, Felix. In fact, one of those times was almost caused by her directly!
Oh yes, of course! I intend on trying my hardest to win every step of the way, Felix. It wouldn't be fair to the others if I didn't, would it?
Hm... I've always found gambling fascinating to an extent, but I think the day my obsession truly began was many years ago... when my sister gambled against the head of the Hundred Families.
Oh, you're completely right, Robin. Hyakkaou Academy was quite the cutthroat environment - only the strongest friend groups tended to last long.
That's correct, Robin. If you had friends at Hyakkaou you knew you could trust, you were quite lucky - manipulation and backstabbing was common there.
...Is that really your outlook on it, Nami? How depressing.
...That's all gambling is to you, Nami? I feel... sorry for you.
But of course! Hyakkaou Academy only accepted the most elite and privileged of society, after all.
Indeed! After all, no one can get into Hyakkaou unless they've got a prodigious fortune to their name.
Well played! I was doing pretty good for a while there, wasn't I?
Aha, good hands! Guess I should've known better than to stick with this one, huh?
Oh no, looks like I'm next! Now then...
I lost? But how could I, with this- pfft! Oh, I can't keep this display up, haha!
Well done! You caught me by surprise that time, seriously!
Oh, wow! I wasn't expecting you to get me that time, haha!
Even with all I had, you still beat me… amazing!
Wow! We've become so neck-and-neck... oh, there's truly no telling where this game will go!
Even now you've found a way to bring me to my knees... oh god, this feeling is wonderful!
Even with your back to the wall, you're still intent on finishing me off! Oh, I love it when my opponent's so relentless!
Haha, I didn't see that coming! What a terrible mistake!
Aw, man! I really thought I’d win this time!
Gosh, you beat me even with this hand? Well done!
Oops! Guess it’s me, then!
Aww, what a shame! I suppose that’s just how it goes, right?
Oh no… Well then, I’ll get to it!
Aha, you got me good there! Time for my penalty, then!
Haha, well-played! Now, which one next…?
Oh? So it's my turn once again...
Ahhh... The feeling of defeat only gets sweeter the less room I have to escape!
Oh, glorious oblivion... I can feel it coming for me!
Oh, yes! The whims of fate, bringing me the consequences I deserve!
Another defeat? Hm-hm-hm, how delightful!
Aww, poor me! Guess my luck wasn't with me this time!
So early on, and I'm already doing so poorly... oh my!
Oh? How much further will lady luck elude me?
Perhaps fortune isn't with me today... or maybe it's just being a little tease!
Oh, I've lost? Too bad!
So I’ve lost again… Goodness, I’m not doing well at all, am I?
Wow! You’re all truly formidable at this! I’m honored to get to play against you all!
The stakes are getting higher and higher for me… I love it!
So little choices left… I’m truly in the thick of it now!
I can feel it… all my losses weighing down on me… the ecstasy is wonderful!
I placed all my hope on this hand, and it still couldn’t win… what a delightful outcome!
Exactly! After all, everyone's bound to lose at some point. If you're not expecting to lose anything, then you've already lost the mental part of it.
Aha, then it sounds like she has good taste, too! Blackjack's a classic - I have fond memories of learning to play it as a little girl.
Exactly. As far back as I can remember, I've always been obsessed with gambling. It wasn't any one incident that sparked it... though there were a few early on that stuck with me.
Indeed she did. I'd never before felt such a powerful mix of pride and envy for her before that day!
...Why would you feel sorry for her, Miku? She took the greatest gambling risk I've ever seen... and got to experience the ultimate ecstasy of its consequences.
Of course it's not easy. No worthwhile gamble is easy to lose. That's what makes it so exciting!
Hm-hm-hm... Of course I am. But aren't you too, at least a little?
But doesn't that sound so dreadful? Knowing the outcome of every situation, having utter control... it'd get so boring so quickly, right?
Really now? So you would live a life of utter certainty if you could? With all the fun of unpredictability taken out of it?
I'd get someone, but... a lot of them seem to avoid eye contact with me. It's not unless I confront them directly that they pay attention. Can you imagine?
I'd wave someone over if I could... but the staff here tries to avoid me if I can. I have to go up to them directly so they can't "accidentally" ignore me - sad, isn't it?
Jura, Jura, Jura... The real purpose of such attachments is to create leverage in a gamble - something that maximizes the thrill. Otherwise, its value becomes meaningless.
Come now, Jura. If something's too sacred to be risked, then what's the point of holding it with such importance anyway? To simply look at it in the confinement of certainty forever?
I'm glad to hear you are! The thrill of the gamble is just infectious, isn't it? How much it puts everything to the whims of chance...
It's great that you're enjoying it, then! To throw so much to the winds of fate, and see where they take you... it's such a joyous feeling, isn't it?
I've had the misfortune of playing against a couple others who were like that - so excited by the consequences of losing that they rigged the game against them. Vile behavior, isn't it?
But what is the purpose of a win if there's no struggle to attain it? Don't you want to feel the exhilaration of snatching victory from someone so determined for your defeat?
Oh yes, victory feels amazing... but without the threat of failure, there's nothing to make it mean anything. I'd be taking your great potential away!
My house? Oh, it's as opulent and beautiful as you can imagine, Mari - my family wanted nothing but the best for the Jabami estate!

There's one particularly big gamble I can remember - back at the Academy, against Council member Yuriko. It was such a thrilling game, I couldn't help but bet my entire fortune! A bet that I promptly lost.

Well, one early example I can remember was against Yuriko - one of the members of the Academy's Council. What a game it was! I may have lost my entire fortune in it, but there was no way I could resist raising so much!
Precisely. After all, the best kinds of games are the ones filled with twists and turns, aren't they?
Exactly. Isn't a game so much better when it's got all sorts of unexpected things throughout? Why limit to just one big payoff?
Of course. Here, we gamble for something beyond life or fortune. We gamble for a part of someone's intimacy.
I know. The stakes at play here may not be conventional things like cash or your health. It's your most private self.
Well, of course! All sorts of card games exist beyond just poker - but games can take many, many forms, a lot of which don't even involve cards.
I'm flattered you think so! But please, don't let it distract you from the fun of it too much. We're all here for that, right?
Well... there's so many different forms it can come in. All kinds of different rules, components, playing pieces, and how all these things inevitably create their own ways of creating game plans...
Quite the strange question to bring up when we're playing with the stakes of our dignity right now, isn't it? Or... are you playing for something else?
I see... clearly you've moved on since then, so how does that bring you here? What are you putting on the line?
Of course! This game is fated to end with you overcoming any last hold your demonic past had on you, proving once and for all how you've changed...
Obviously I could. In fact, that makes it even better... your gamble has become my gamble too! I'm playing for my life just as much as you're playing for yours!
Yep! I remember hearing whispers of the Inventory, learning everything about what it is and its past, and I knew I had to see it myself!
Oh, but it can be much more than just that, Samus! It can be a way of experiencing the highest heights you'll ever feel... and the lowest lows, too!
Is it, Samus? Not all gambles involve cards, or even conventional game setups. They can have all kinds of rules, all kinds of opponents, and all kinds of things at stake.

It's like this - any time you make an important choice or risk something, you're making a gamble. Whether you could win money, lose your life, gain new freedom, or have no one respect you... even seemingly certain scenarios have a risk.

Isn't it obvious? We both seek our respective thrills, time and time again. We live for the danger and glory they bring, and won't let anything stop us from experiencing all they have to offer, even with the consequences for failure!

Protecting people is your thrill. Knowing all the lives you'll save if you do your job, and all the ones who could die if you fail... that's what keeps you coming back! It's the bet you make every time you take a mission!
I'm glad you understand! Why feel ashamed of losing something you knew the risks of - especially this early on, when there's still so much more?
Exactly! The game's far from over, and it'd be far more embarrassing to face a loss you made for yourself with grief.
Oh gosh, there's just so many! I couldn't possibly choose just one... though some do stick out more than others.
My favorite one, from all I've played? I don't think I could ever make that choice for sure! Though... some do stick out especially well.
Stress? Haha, not at all! I appreciate your concern, but if anything, that's what makes it so exciting!
Oh? Can you really see through people that easily, Sweetheart?
Well, can you blame them? With how thrilling it gets and how big the consequences are... why would you not want to get addicted?
No one, of course! Gambling, by design, is not rational behavior. But those who enjoy it most have to be quite clever.
Oh yes. It was a truly incredible game - one where I had put the life fortune of both me and my dear friend on the line... and my opponent had done the same.
Well, we are playing to preserve our dignity and privacy, aren't we? But if that was all, I could've gone to any other strip poker den.
Aww, have you really hated my company that much? And here I thought I was showing you the true joys of gambling - the ones you were so unfortunate to have lived so long without!
Interesting... So you can hear our heartbeats. A possible tool at your disposal in this game, is it? Maybe even the key to your victory?
Oh, how could I not? The thrill of the uncertainty, of pitting your skill and luck with an unknowable outcome... all my life, I've lived for it!
Oh, absolutely! Just about everyone in the Hundred Devouring Families is familiar with gambling to some extent - and the Jabami clan is definitely one of the most!
Hyakkaou Academy... It was a school by the elites, for their next generation. Everyone who came was used to being at the top, but now they needed a new way of deciding who was truly the top.
Absolutely. Besides, the rush from losing can feel just as enthralling as the rush from winning. Watching the whims of chance play out before you, knowing what's on the line...

Oh, gambling in general! I couldn't pick one single game - in fact, part of why I love it is how many different forms it can take!
Precisely. That's why I came to the Inventory. I know of how many people it draws, from all kinds of different places and backgrounds... And that can only mean one thing.
Hm. Sounds like a classic case of snubbing simplicity to me. People forget that complexity is a measure of depth, but not quality.
Haha! Well, you'd be utterly wrong in this case, Yuno - so you'd better be careful with what you bet against me!
Oh? And what was this "special gift"?

Oh no, don't worry about it! If anything, I'm happy for you!
No need to feel awkward, Shamiko! Honestly, this'll make the game even more exciting!
Oh my! Eager to up the stakes of this game already? I knew you seemed unusual for a shrine maiden, but I'm pleasantly surprised!
I do, Nadeshiko! The ones I hang with the most are Mary and Ryota - they've been by me for so many different games!
Well, there can be no glory without risk, correct? Anyone with a modicum of intelligence knows this.

Of course! We've known each other since our time in Hyakkaou Academy, and we've been inseparable ever since.
Indeed! We've seen each other through all of our greatest victories... and even our most treacherous defeats!
I deeply disagree. The truth is, I don't have any sentimentality for the status and fortune my family made. It's merely a means to an end for me.
Oh, absolutely! I wouldn't be here if I wasn't, now, would I?

Exactly! Knowing that I'm being gunned for as much as everyone else, to have my dignity stripped away and give everyone such a personal show if I lose...
In more ways than one, Felix. It's a private school for only the upper crust of society, the children of the elite... but it's also the perfect place for those with an irresistible draw to gambling.
Of course I have! That's why we found ourselves so unrelentingly drawn to each other... no one else could make a game truly as unpredictable.
I'm so glad that we agree, Felix! Nothing's worse than robbing someone of a genuine challenge... I'd dread to encounter one of those types in this place.
It was as intense as it could've gotten. She played with all she could muster... and she lost more than just her fortune. Her title, her very sanity... all part of the price she paid.
Of course! With all the places and people the Inventory reaches out to, it's like an unending parade of opponents to play with!
Indeed! As soon as I heard of what the Inventory's like - how it's connected to all kinds of people and worlds - I couldn't resist so many opportunities!
It's usually a smart decision to make smaller sacrifices first, wouldn't you agree? That way you've got some time to get a read on how your opponents play.
If any of you are looking for gambling advice, here's a good one - don't be afraid to take small losses on purpose. They can give you an early read on the others.
I wasn't sure at first if pants like these would suit me - I actually haven't worn many before, if you can believe it.

I still love wearing this blazer, even if I’m not part of Hyakkaou Academy anymore. I think I feel happier whenever it’s on!

I could go for my skirt now. But I’m loving this feeling of pressure too much to play it safe anymore!

Exactly! Well... not harm of that kind, anyway.

Not at all! I just love the thought of getting to be one of your first times! I can't wait to show you how great gambling is!
Oh yes, no one does. But I'm sure you'll do your best!
And, by extension, how they all have their own ways of presenting the risks and dangers involved! Their own methods of punishing failure!
More than just winning? Oh my... how fascinating! I need to know more!

Wow... so it isn't your dignity or privacy you've gambled here. It's your very humanity! Your desire for benevolence! In truth, you're playing a whole different game from the rest of us... Incredible!
...Or it'll end in utter tragedy. Your succubus instincts will take over once more, and you'll go mad with lust and kill us all in a spectacular orgy of bloodshed!

Oh, I met a great deal of other gambling aficionados there - and I'm still delighted to call them my friends! Yet... only one of them is fully eye-to-eye on me when it comes to the thrill of gambling.

But then I saw how they looked on me, and, well, I just fell in love!

Don’t think of it as an underwhelming win. Think of it as you just getting started!
I know this doesn’t seem like much right now. But just think of it as a hint of what’s to come!
So many great gambling memories I made… I was truly blessed to have been allowed there!
Truly one of the best academies ever made! I can’t imagine any other having the gambling life it did!

So my blouse will be next! After all, this is what you all came to see, right?

Oh, the danger’s too good! I can’t resist - I forfeit my panties as well!

...Let's get this over with.
...~player~'s up. How thrilling.

Simply amazing... I thought I knew so much about high stakes and gambles, but you're even more intimately familiar with them than I!
Why deny yourself of what you truly love, Dunban? It does you no good to be so dishonest - your very arm is a testament to that.

My housepets? They become subservient to me. They entertain me when I ask, go shopping with me, assist my friends... in fact, if one of my friends takes a liking enough, I let them take ownership.
I'm glad to see you understand, Felix. It's a feeling unlike any other, risking so much to fate. You feel it too, don't you?
I'm glad to see you understand, Felix. It's a feeling unlike any other, risking so much to fate. You feel it too, don't you?

Yes! We're approaching the best part of any game - when any slight mistake could be the end for anyone here!

Are you conscious about your chest? Well, it doesn't matter... we all know exactly how it looks now.
I've heard some small-chested girls get envious easily. What about you, ~name~? Is the red in your face meant to hide any green?
Hm-hm-hm... Ohhhh, now we'll always remember everything about how you look...
That's right, ~name~. Give everyone a good look. Give us the full treatment of your penalty.
Go on, ~name~. Show yourself off. Give in to the penalty your gamble demanded.
The sight of your breasts... oh, how exhilarating it is to take it for ourselves...
I bet so many people have thought about seeing your breasts in full, ~name~... and now we all get to have what they never could.
Wow... they look so full and soft... and now, we can enjoy the sight of them all we wish.
Hmmm... Would you be opposed to letting your little cat knead your chest, ~name~? Meow!
...Are you done?
Is that all? Good.
Don’t act shy, now. We’ve all earned a good look, haven’t we?
How does it feel, knowing you’ve become this exposed? Reflecting on the rounds that led to this?
Your breasts are laid bare, and you’re still playing… I love your devotion to this gamble, ~name~!
You’re going to stay, even with all you’ve lost already? You’re mad with determination… amazing!
Wow! I never expected this kind of decision! I have no idea what your plan is, but I’m positively excited to see it!
God, I didn’t think anyone would be bold enough to remove that so early! I can’t help but respect such gusto!
Oh, yes! There’s nowhere to hide! Show us everything, ~name~!
Yes… we’ve earned this, ~name~. Give it to us.
Finally... your biggest sacrifice yet! Don't shirk away, show us everything!
At long last... when this is done, you'll have nearly nothing left to hide! Do it, ~name~!
Before long, ~name~, we could be right in the same place together... join me.
Yes... We were all hoping it would come to this, ~name~.
Are you trying to hide yourself? Oh my… how absolutely delicious!
Still trying to shy away? Hm-hm! It’s adorable watching you squirm like this!
You truly aren’t intimidated by what lies ahead, are you? Your resolve is truly a virtue!
What a show! Getting to play against someone like you is a privilege, ~name~!
This is it! Your final stand! Your last chance to turn this crushing moment into glory! I can’t wait!
Here you are - as exposed as you’ve ever been. Is this as low as it’ll get for you? Or will you sink even lower?
Haah, my masters are so generous... letting me join them in gazing upon their reward...
This is it, ~name~! Will you turn things around here... or end up like me, a loser housepet?
Your last stand has begun! Your moment of glory... or utter and complete shame!
At last! It's time, ~name~ - time to prove what kind of gambling freak you truly are!
Oh my, starting with a big play already? Then let's see it, Moon!
...Excuse me, Moon? You do remember you don't need to surrender everything at once, right?
Hmm... perhaps your eagerness to strip so quickly is an act to throw us off? What a devious move...!
Wait... you're trying to get to your final stage as fast as possible? I didn't take that idea into account...
Mm...
...I should've known right from the start. You never had any interest in giving us a good challenge this game, did you?
Well. This was what you wanted, right Moon?
You're quite the well-built man, Mr. Raynor. Are you a fighter of some sort?
Honestly, I didn't expect I'd be meeting someone of your status and achievement tonight! I have so many questions, seriously!
Your tactics must involve some level of subversion, right? What's your favorite way to outsmart the enemy, Mr. Raynor?
Wow, this really is quite amazing! You've truly experienced so much over the years, Mr. Raynor!
Why are you so confused, Mr. Raynor? Aren't you proud of everything you've accomplished?
I truly can't understate what an honor it is to play against someone with your experience, Mr. Raynor. This is the kind of chance that'd come only once in a lifetime!
Come on, Jim - you don't really believe you're so different from others like you, do you?
There's no need to be so defensive, Mr. Raynor. I'm not attacking your character or anything.
...You're not interested in taking this seriously, are you, ~player~?
It's funny - I wasn't sure when I came here if I'd be the only one still wearing my school uniform. It's easy to get attached to them, isn't it?
Aha! So I'm not the only one still wearing my school uniform here! I assume you're graduated too, then? Or just a senior?
My my! A member of a royal family joining us here? How grand! It's a shame we were never classmates at Hyakkaou, ~name~!
Oh my! I'm no stranger to playing with noble scions, especially after Hyakkaou, but I didn't know if I'd find any here!
A visitor from another world, coming to gamble with us... Haha! I suppose even the stranger things I dreamt of as a little girl can come true after all!
So, this place draws in players even from planets beyond... Are we earthlings really that special? Or maybe we're just better to gamble with!
Would it really be such a shame to brighten up a little more, ~name~? We've got an exciting gamble tonight, surrounded by good company... Why so serious?
Come on, ~name~. We all came here to have a good time gambling. Wouldn't it be better to embrace the fun than killing the mood?
Haha! Well, you're the first demon I've ever seen - along with our other present company, of course!
Aha! Not too far off from my guess, then! Have you been in it long?
If you don't mind, what's your strategy usually like? How do you go about the battles you undertake?
That's right. How does this play in?
Why wouldn't I be? I never shy away from learning about a game or gamble, no matter the type.
Of course it is! It may have a far greater scope of rules and change in ways unprecedented by any other, but there's a reason games like Chess and Shogi are based on it!
Isn't it, though? In war, you're playing for a prize like any other gamble. Land, resources, an ideal - any of them can be the reward you intend to win!
Everyone fights for something important, Jim. It wouldn't be war if they weren't.
Why would they care? They've already devoted themselves to this - to becoming your pawns and betting chips. All they need to worry about is fighting and dying for your cause.
Hm... you're a lot more nervous than an idol typically is. Is something wrong?
Well, have you ever heard of Yumemi Yumemite?
Huh? What are you...
Wait a minute... Is you being a zombie supposed to be a secret?
It really does mean a lot to you, doesn't it... Tell you what. Beat me in this game, and you have my guarantee that I won't tell anyone.
...Is bra integrity harder as an idol too?
It really does mean a lot to you, doesn't it... Well, you've already made me your housepet. What business do I have to threaten the secret of my victor?
Oh, not at all! I'd never do that to one of my friends!
Well, there's plenty of ways to meet new people - most don't even involve the risks of strip poker. There's more of a reason you chose to come here, isn't there?
Just to meet people...? No. No, that's not all. If it was, you wouldn't have chosen the setting of strip poker to do so. Why are you really here?
Ah-ha, my guess was right! Well, you're making quite the big step out of your comfort zone by coming here, without a doubt.
So my intuition was right, then! In that case, you've chosen to take that next step in quite the significant way.
Well, your looks already speak for themselves, don't they? Please, tell me all about your kingdom!
Oh, I can imagine! Someone like you should only have the highest kind of standards, considering who and what you are!
Oh? So you chose to come here to find new venerators? I suppose that makes sense, what with how many people this place has reached out to!
Oh, of course, I'm not denying your high status or anything. But there's something else that seems to contradict what you're saying...
Cheating? You really think cheating is enough to nullify how a game decides the winner? What an adorably naive notion!
But don't you deserve to win? Wouldn't that mean you'd figure out how you're being cheated, and find a way to beat the cheater's strategy?
Why not? Did you really think your victory was so assured, Sweetheart? Did you not see yourself losing like this?
I see... Then you're just happy about getting into the magic of gambling for the first time, then?
Interesting... In that case, I assume you're just excited to try out gambling in all its glory, right?
Oh, nothing at all! It's just so unlike any other one I've seen before - thus one of the sharpest indications of how different your world is from mine.
Aha, how clever! Then this poker game is only one part of your larger game to accrue more followers? What a truly divine plan!
I see... So the real game you're playing is a game of gathering devotion, which this is only another step in! This scheme of yours is as divine as you are!
Be careful, now. Blunders have a way of adding up... Better you learn now than later.
Then please - show us how you'll turn this game around Aqua. If it's still possible, that is.
...Are you trying to lose, then?
...Then you're losing on purpose?
A warm blanket? That does sound quite comfy. Do you usually dress like this, then?
It's so nice when a friend introduces you to a new passion, isn't it? How did she get you into camping?
Would you really, Nadeshiko? I'd love that! We'll have plenty of time after this game, so I'd want to learn everything you could possibly teach me!
Absolutely! So many beautiful sights, such crisp natural air, the beautiful flora and fauna...

Go against it? I would've thought they'd go perfectly. To take the stakes of a risky gamble, and hold them miles away from civilization, where the line between what you value and its loss is thinner than ever...
Certainly! I always enjoy hearing my friends talk about what they've been up to, going out for ice cream with them... life's always better when you're with the people you care about, right?
Gambling is what I live for, you see. It's what makes me happy, brings me excitement even in times where I might be sad... Everyone has a special purpose they live for, right?
Come on, now. You're no stranger to loving such risks yourself, aren't you? Heading into places far removed from society, depending on only your knowledge of the wilds and the tools you've chosen?
Wow, that sounds prestigious! How did your family earn their status?
Wow! On top of everything else, you're also a war hero? That's truly amazing, Toph!
Simple; we're both nobles of upper-crust prestige who aren't content to sit on our laurels and stay comfy. We want something more.
Really? How do earthbending and those vibrations work like that?
Aha, so it played a key role in ending that war like you mentioned! How does it work?
Aw, that's a shame. Still, though, if your new focus is training a new generation of benders like you, it sounds like a net gain to me!
Aha, I could tell! You've got that confidence and determination about you that I've seen in the eyes of many other gamblers!
Exactly! Big tournaments like that are only natural when an exciting game has caught steam in the world. And I don't doubt they were thrilling ones, too!
Goodness, it sounds like you've got quite the rogue's gallery! So many different rivals can only show up in the most storied paths of gamers!
Wow... a whole ancient tradition of betting your soul? I can't believe I never heard of this before! Please, tell me more!
Come on, Yuno. Didn't you feel a rush of joy when you'd won? The excitement of overcoming such a danger, of winning such a great prize?
It's only natural people like us should gravitate towards each other. To embrace the madness and chaos of gambling with another... it feels truly invigorating.
Oh, don't you understand, Aqua? Loss is the great equalizer. No matter who you are, anyone has the chance to lose everything they've bet in a gamble.
Perhaps in a cosmic way, Aqua. All your years of immortality, and it seems you're only now learning the true nature of loss - how it affects anyone of any background.
It means everything, Aqua. No matter who we are or where we come from, anyone has the chance to win. Just as anyone has the chance to lose.
You still don't get it, do you? When it comes to luck, no one is more disposed to victory than anyone else. Even with your blessings, you aren't infallible.
Really... So you intend to boost your odds with assistance from your friend here. But by how much?
Interesting... So you were also brought here knowing of the nature of this place, and all the worlds it calls out to.
Forgive me if I'm not convinced, but in games like this, no one does anything without a reason. Including keeping a part of themselves absolutely still.
Well, I suppose my question demonstrates that, haha! Of course, I get the feeling our stories are anything but similar.
Interesting... You must face some truly great threats to your homeland, then?
Aha! I hadn't forgotten about that one bit... is it related to your life as a soldier, perhaps?
Oh, I'm sure it was calculated. As calculated as you've calculated anything in your life before. But that's the beautiful thing about risks: they're always a gamble to some extent.
My own views? Sounds to me like an easy way to avoid confronting the truth about yourself. That there's a sizable part of you that loves the danger and the risk.
...French fries? You were compelled to the Inventory because of its french fries?
Well, I mean, people usually show up to things like gambling dens for the gambling itself. The refreshments are usually seen as a way to tide you over for the duration.
Haha! Well, you're the first demon I've ever seen! And I doubt many others where I'm from can say otherwise!
Ahahaha! Are you really that surprised? Where I'm from, demons are mostly seen as superstition!

Isn't it obvious? You've heard the stories about it too, haven't you? A gambling den connected to all sorts of worlds, offering endless possibilities for games of chance... how could I ever resist the opportunity?!
Oh, yes! It's so rare to see such a knowledge resource managed by people not from any elite circles! Actually, it was something of a strange talking point around Hyakkaou Academy for that reason.
Ah, donations from benefactors? That's quite the unreliable process - you must be very fortunate to have lasted as long as you have from it!
Simple. You challenge me to any game of your choice, best two out of three. If you win, then you get, let's see... 50,000,000 yen! All yours in an instant!

Why? Imagine how high their approval would be if you won! Bring them such a fortune like that, and you'd become a legend to journalists everywhere! The risk, the absolute precipice of fortune or ruination... oh god, isn't it thrilling?!
You? You mean... you would become my housepet permanently if you lost?
Oh, my! How delightful! I never thought I'd see anything like you, Felix - this place truly does bring forth some fascinating things!
Hahaha! Wow, nothing gets past you, does it? I'm impressed beyond what mere words can offer!
Haha! Oh, Felix... I gave up the idea of limits long ago. They only hold the game back from its full potential. In fact, if I'm lucky, you'll end up learning that firsthand...

Of course they can gamble their way out! It may be fun to have them around, but it'd be dreadful if it lasted forever, wouldn't it? Besides, to watch them take control and fight out of it... it can be just as enthralling.
Well, are you? I assure you, I like to think I'm quite the good master. Though I doubt the real deal like you will need to put much effort into playing along!
Well, if more discipline is what you need, then I'd be more than happy to give it to you. I'll have you rolling on your back and begging for treats in no time!
Really? Are you still denying the truth, even with your current situation so clear? We always thought divinity was the same as being infalliable... but what does that make you?
So you still assert your perfection? The way you profess your celestial status, you'd think you wouldn't even have lost to this point... perhaps it's only you that isn't divine?
Aww, you really think so, Mari? Well, there's something about that I should tell you...
Oh my, you think so? Well, there is a slight rebuttal I have to that...
Thank you! What is it like living in space? Does it require special preparations?
Excellent! Living in space probably doesn't happen in a day, right? How did you get ready for it?
What a shame. A gambling environment like this can be the perfect way to get to know more about others. Even those so closed-off normally.
That's too bad. I love getting to know others through games like these - it's a shame I won't get to learn about Barnette to~background.time~.
Your bra already? Hm-hm, that's quite the genius play! It's shocking enough to throw everyone off, but you've risked no exposure yet despite how important it is!
Good. Sorry, but it'd be a terrible waste if you didn't give yourself more leeway, wouldn't it?
Oh wait, were you trying to keep your plan secret? Sorry, I guess I just exposed it by accident, haha!
Well... you've been keeping me on my toes nonetheless, regardless of how much you've lost. That's impressive for sure!
...You're not actually interested in playing this game seriously, are you, Moon?
No, of course not. I feel stupid for having given you the benefit of the doubt to begin with.
Go on. Strip your last pathetic item.
Wow! How truly amazing! Not only do I get to gamble at the Inventory, I get to do so with another world's deity! I almost can't believe it!
Oh my gosh, this is incredible! I knew the Inventory would bring some significant opponents, but a goddess from another world? That's the opportunity of a lifetime!
Oh my! Is this a display of your true power?
Ah, but luck is still a factor in those, isn't it? In all games, both luck and skill go hand-in-hand.
Oh, I don't deny that your skill has played a big role in those. But it'd be dishonest to deny the role that luck played for you as well.
Holy crap! So there's virtual reality where you come from? As in, simulations that make you feel like you're in the world of a game?
For real? If we're thinking of the same thing - computer games that simulate acting within them - then it's become a common reality where you're from?
Oh my! So you've decided to not merely forfeit your clothing with each loss... you're destroying it entirely!
Oh? You weren't yet satisfied with the stakes already settled, were you? Instead you've opted to make your own gradual losses... permanent!
Well, psychological traps are part of any game like this... but I assume that's not what you're talking about.
No. We are as different as an ant and the boot that steps on it.
We are nothing alike. The very thought of that holding any semblance of truth makes me want to puke.
Oh, wow! A commander of your own military organization?! Truly incredible!
Aha, that makes sense! Better to not overcommit your resources past the point you could possibly get anything worthwhile from it.
Ah, a numbers game combined with unforeseen equipment! What a brilliant play!
Isn't it obvious? After all... what greater game is there than the directing of a war? What greater meeting of both raw skill and pure luck than on the battlefield?
Simple. To give people a taste, no matter how small or lacking by comparison, of the greatest test of wit out there. A gamble that shapes entire nations and worlds.

Any game can be serious when the stakes are high, Mr. Raynor. Some people gamble entire life fortunes away in cards. Others even bet their own health or their property in such games. How is your cause different?
Well, of course. The victor always decides that. That's what makes it so exciting!
I know what I am, James Raynor. And I don't feel compelled to be ashamed of it.
Ahaha, wow! You're not kidding, are you? Gosh, that's quite the unexpected blunder!
Well, she has been working her way up for a while now - even though she's bigger than she used to be, I guess I can't blame you for not knowing her.
Oh my... What exactly is this all about, Sakura?
Well well well... I'm right, aren't I?
Of course! What better method than leaving it up to the whims of fate?! Of letting the cards decide the destiny of Franchouchou's dark secret?!
Aww, but the psychological part is so fun in gambling! After all, what better way to truly learn the people you're playing with inside and out?
Ahahaha! Oh, how I wish I could tell Yumemi about this later!
Of course! I want everyone I play with to experience all the highs and lows that gambling has to offer... it'd be so selfish to make anyone feel left out, wouldn't it?
Woah! You've removed the whole power suit all at once? You're way bolder than I thought, Samus!
Gosh, that sounds truly prestigious! I can only lament that I've never seen your castle before, with how grand it sounds!
Well, I did attend an academy surrounded by others in various high-class positions. It'd be stranger if I didn't understand after all that, wouldn't it?
Interesting... So for you, the gamble is less about the losses from the game itself, and more about comparing with the other players?
Perhaps... or perhaps you don't actually deserve to win?
Of course I do. If you deserve to win, then you'll win. But if you lose... then you never deserved to win it.
Then do it. Find the cheater. Prove you deserve the place of the winner, and not my new housepet.
Are you scared of the prospect of losing? The thought of a proud and mighty princess... reduced to a bare and humiliated loser in front of her challengers?!
But of course! After all... the greater the opponent, the greater the stakes at play, right?
Absolutely! The most prestigious opponents present the greatest opportunity for glory... and for failure.
I see... In a way, it's like this game is merely a smaller gamble in the midst of a larger game you're already playing! How delightful!
Interesting... When you think about it, this game is simply another move in the greater gamble you've been playing already! Fascinating!
My, my! That eager to strip down and humiliate the others here, are you?
That excited by the prospect of winning the clothes and dignity of our opponents, are you? I can respect that!
Hm-hm, you're right about that. I'm glad to know you understand!
Oh yes, very true. No point belaboring it when we both know what we want, right?
Aha, so you're a camping enthusiast? Now it all makes sense!
Haha, then it was quite the long journey, wasn't it? I guess you really aren't a stranger to taking unexpected risks - how delightful!
Aha, very good to know! I'd hate to think about forgetting details like those!
...And in a place like the wilderness, the risks and dangers of gambling can only get even more exciting.
And with every move you make, everything surrounding you in the wilds reminds you of how lost we are without our possessions, or even our very rights... oh, doesn't it just get you so fired up?!
Take a break from gambling? Aww, Nadeshiko... How naive to assume I can.
I've always had the passion for it deep in my heart, Nadeshiko... ever since I was a little girl. I couldn't stop even if I wanted to... but why would I ever want to, with how exciting it always is?
Oh really? And haven't you ever thought about going even further? About really testing the limits of your survival?
Merchantry and politics? Gosh, it sounds like your family has quite the wide reach! I'm impressed!
I'm utterly impressed, for real! It's a shame we never went to Hyakkaou Academy together, you would've been a true prodigy among prodigies!
You were locked away from the world? Wow... That sounds utterly dreadful. A life so separated from the thrills of the world is no life at all.
My goodness! I've never heard of anything like that! Is earthbending really that powerful?

Fascinating... and yet while your opponents are forced to concentrate on using their eyes too, you can see even more with less. You're feeling both the earth, and all upon it. It's like your game is entirely different!
A whole new generation... the next line of those with a love for competition and to gamble the stakes at hand... Oh Toph, if only I'd met you sooner!
Oh? You aren't? Hm-hm... I don't think that's quite true, Yuno.
I'm sure it was intense - especially if rivals were there too! But don't lie... there was a part of you that liked it, wasn't there?
A... demon? Who made you bet for the souls of your friends?
...Amazing!
Exactly. Relief, joy, pride... it all swirls together when at the height of a victory.
Don't shun what you haven't truly tried yet, Yuno. Meet me again later... I'll show you the true glory of gambling!
...So you are trying a little? Then what will you attain by winning?
...So you don't care if you win or lose? To what extent?
Oh, I appreciate the offer! But I'll have to decline - I have no interest in organized religion.
I'm flattered you're inviting me directly! But sadly, my answer is no. Faith gives me nothing I'm looking for.
Yes! The true power of the gods! Now the game really begins!
Yes! Show us your godly power! Bring everything you have to this gamble of divinity!
Of course. Just don't discount the role that luck can play... or how it keeps things exciting.
No argument here. But you'd do well to remember that anything can change at any time... and no game would be nearly as good without that.
But more than that, you've shown how even gods will bring everything they have when they fear defeat. Meaning you've revealed a great truth... Even gods can be so mortal!
Furthermore, you're only playing as hard as you can because you fear the consequences of defeat. A fear mortals thought was exclusive to them... but now, the gods are closer than ever to us!
We're so different, you and I... but if your luck continues as it has, we'll both taste the ecstasy of glorious, crushing defeat!
Gods? Mortals? Fortune is something too powerful and uncaring to concern itself with that... only that we can be loser housepets together!
Ahahaha! So it seems even the Inventory itself can outsmart its players! God, I'm loving this place more and more!
Indeed! I'd searched for this place for a while, and it's just as magnificent as I'd hoped... and I'm guessing you've wanted something like this for a while too.
Really? Well... if your goal was to lessen my interest, you've completely failed.
Oh, definitely not. But when you put it like that, it makes me wish I did!
Relentless mechanical threats? Wild beasts? Wow! I figured you have an exciting life, but I still underestimated you!
Oh my! So this is why your arm hasn't been moving, is it? And here I thought it was all part of some clever card ruse!
Really? So you don't feel any pleasure in taking such risks? The adrenaline you feel, the satisfaction you partake... does it not exist?
If that's how you truly feel, then why come back? Why not leave the field of battle, and pass the task onto someone else?
Hm... Not the motivation I was expecting, but who am I to judge? Everyone comes to a gamble for different reasons, right?
Well, that's for sure! Who knows - I haven't tried any of the eats this place has yet, so for all I know they really could be just as amazing as the rest of it!
Oh, of course I do! We might not play for money or property or anything of the sort... ...We play for something far more valuable.

Oh, the usual reasons their parents tend to tell them to think. Putting it in the hands of commoners creates negligence, incompetence that leads to political bias, and so on. I never cared enough to get involved.
That's good to hear. I do respect people who take big chances for big rewards, whatever the circumstances.
...Then I get your encyclopedia, and all rights to it.

Hm-hm-hm, you are clever. But why turn away? Doesn't that only make victory all the more rewarding, winning in a situation where all odds were against you? Doesn't rising above make it so much sweeter?
...Hm-hm-hahahahahahahaha! I knew there was a reason I liked you, Wikipe-tan! You really know how to up the stakes and get me going! I gladly accept these terms! Gladly!
Underlying with what? You don't think I can just be happy to see a cat-person as cute as you here? To indulge in one of the things the Inventory was made for?
You truly can't tell? And here I thought you had me thoroughly figured out... or are you just being coy?
Come now. Gambling is all about the exchange of ownership as fate deems. How could I possibly resist the chance... to make an actual cat-person my housepet?
Oh, I don't mind if they do so willingly. In fact, I prefer it! But... I expect the courtesy of a good game first. For both of us to feel the thrill.
Well well well... you know just the right answers to give, too. God, you're going to be such a fun housepet... or a really fun owner!
Oh, both will easily be on the table, Felix... as well as the discretion of my friends, when I bring them over to share you! What a lucky kitty - you'll be getting a lot of attention!
...Hahaha! Ahhhhahahahahaaaaaa! "Am I human," you ask? "Am I human?" "Am I human?" "Am I human?!?"
Absolutely remarkable... If games have come so far as to allow that, imagine just how much further they can go!
Incredible... Once upon a time, such a thing would be pure fantasy, but now-! What an absolute marvel of ingenuity!
Haha, you've really gone all in on drawing the most attention in the game, haven't you? Well, the odds are in your favor on that one, Moon!
Strange... What kind of game are you playing here, Moon...?
Well, look at it this way - if the others know, then now you'll be forced to adapt and change up your strategy! How exciting, right?
And yet... I can't help but feel as though something's off...
Of course. Figures I run into another person like you even here.
Sigh... I can only hope the others don't feel too let down by this too.
What a waste. Any weight this moment would've once had has been stripped away along with every other worthless thing you brought.
Well, your friend made a very good choice. Were I more cowardly, I'd almost feel bad about making you forfeit it!
It truly goes to show how wonderful this place is, doesn't it? So many different people and worlds, all coming together for the magic of gambling!
Yes! Break the limits of your mortal disguise, Shamiko! Now your game truly begins!
...Actually, you know what? I don't care who the other person is. I'm shooting you.
Wonderful. I come to a gambling den of endless possibilities... and already an opponent robs me of a good gamble.
Such grand stakes, such an impactful way to lose... Oh, it's just too good!
Now I see that look in your eyes, ~name~... The look of someone determined to live this game to the fullest! To feel every consequence of your actions as they come!
Oh? So another will be joining you? What a nice surprise! I'll be getting two housepets for the effort of one!
Oh my! So another's decided to shoulder the loss with you? How sweet! ...And what a nice bonus prize for me.
Oh? So another will be joining you? What a nice surprise! I'll be getting two housepets for the effort of one!
Oh my! So another's decided to shoulder the loss with you? How sweet! ...And what a nice bonus prize for me.
Oh? So another will be joining you? What a nice surprise! I'll be getting two housepets for the effort of one!
